text: Meyer (Mike) Howard Abrams (July 23, 1912 â€“ April 21, 2015), usually cited as M. H. Abrams, was an American literary critic. He was known for works on Romanticism, in particular his book The Mirror and the Lamp. Abrams died in Ithaca, New York, aged 102. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1912 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American centenarians Category:American literary critics Category:Educators from New Jersey Category:Writers from New Jersey Category:Writers from New York (state)
title: M. H. Abrams
